Based in the Greater Chicago Area, Chris Misztur brings over 25 years of experience as President & Founder of Mr. IIoT. He is an expert in Industrial IoT, Smart Factory implementation, Industry 4.0, and digital transformation, leveraging solutions like SHARC and DIME for manufacturing excellence.
